nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_508
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Should you have any doubt about the plan, please feel free to contact us at any time.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_509
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We have learned how to face reality instead of escaping from it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_510
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It just proves that you can't hope to turn in a worthy report if you haven't done enough preparation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_511
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We have to face that possibility no matter how unlikely it may sound.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_512
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The newcomers found it hard to adapt themselves to the climate there.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_513
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It strikes me as odd that school children are required to come to school two hours before class.
